name: AddPromoCodeToStore
description:
Add a new promo code to an ecommerce store.

Use this tool to add a new promotional code to a specific store in the ecommerce platform. This is useful for managing discounts and promotions within the store.

parameters.name: store_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the ecommerce store where the promo code will be added.

parameters.name: promo_rule_identifier
parameters.description: The ID for the promotional rule associated with the store.

value_schema.description: The id for the promo rule of a store.

parameters.name: promo_code_identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the promo code. Must be UTF-8, max length 50.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier for the promo code. Restricted to UTF-8 characters with max length 50.

parameters.name: promo_code
parameters.description: The discount code for the promotion. It must be a UTF-8 string, with a maximum length of 50 characters.

value_schema.description: The discount code. Restricted to UTF-8 characters with max length 50.

parameters.name: promotion_redemption_url
parameters.description: The URL used in the promotion campaign. Must be UTF-8, max length 2000 characters.

value_schema.description: The url that should be used in the promotion campaign restricted to UTF-8 characters with max length 2000.

parameters.name: promo_code_usage_count
parameters.description: Number of times the promo code has been used. This integer value helps track the utilization of the promo code.

value_schema.description: Number of times promo code has been used.

parameters.name: promotion_creation_datetime
parameters.description: The date and time the promotion was created, in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: The date and time the promotion was created in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: promotion_updated_datetime
parameters.description: The date and time the promotion was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: The date and time the promotion was updated in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: is_promo_code_enabled
parameters.description: Specifies if the promo code is enabled. Use true to enable, false to disable.

value_schema.description: Whether the promo code is currently enabled.
